title: Quarkus 2.12.0.Final released - GraalVM/Mandrel 22.2, Kotlin 1.7
content: Quarkus 2.12 is a relatively small release, with most development happening in August and all. But it still comes with a lot of documentation improvements, fixes and enhancements, most notably: Upgrade to GraalVM/Mandrel 22.2 Upgrade to Kotlin 1.7 SmallRye Config SecretKeys support Microsoft SQL Server JDBC driver update Migration Guide...
